title: Halloween Giveaway Not Working???
body: When I go to put in my username after claiming a $25 card, it tells me that my summoner name or location is incorrect, and both are right...what do I do?

replies.body: It sounds like you might have been on a phishing website designed to steal your account info. Riot doesn't do Halloween giveaways like that and that only official way to purchase RP through us is through the client shop. I'd suggest you reach out to our accounts team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as soon as you can to make sure your account hasn't been compromised!
